articles.title: Sailing: Dean Barker reveals he battled cancer while training for 2021 America's Cup - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: He received treatment over a six month period, all while keeping his sailing dreams alive.
articles.content: Dean Barker has revealed he had just recovered from cancer treatment while competing at the 2021 America's Cup. Photo / Photosport New Zealand sailor Dean Barker has revealed he was battling cancer w… [+2887 chars]
